com.metreeca.rest

Interface Wrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aliaser, Controller, CORS, Driver, Launcher, Rewriter, Server, Validator
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Wrapper
    Handler wrapper {thread-safe}.

    Inspects and possibly alters requests and responses processed and generated by resource handlers.

    Warning / Implementations must be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      static Wrapper error(Function<Response,Response> mapper)
      Creates an error response wrapper.
      static <V> Wrapper postprocessor(Format<V> format, BiFunction<Response,V,V> mapper)
      Creates a successful response body wrapper.

    • Method Detail

      • wrapper

        static Wrapper wrapper()
        Creates a dummy wrapper.
        Returns:
        a dummy wrapper that performs no action on requests and responses

      • wrapper

        static Wrapper wrapper(Predicate<Request> test,
                       Wrapper pass)
        Creates a conditional wrapper.
        Parameters:
        test - the request predicate used to decide if requests and responses are to be routed through the wrapper
        pass - the wrapper requests and responses are to be routed through when test evaluates to true on the request
        Returns:
        a conditional wrapper that routes requests and responses through the pass handler if the test predicate evaluates to true on the request or to a dummy wrapper otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either test or pass is null

      • wrapper

        static Wrapper wrapper(Predicate<Request> test,
                       Wrapper pass,
                       Wrapper fail)
        Creates a conditional wrapper.
        Parameters:
        test - the request predicate used to select the wrapper requests and responses are to be routed through
        pass - the wrapper requests and responses are to be routed through when test evaluates to true on the request
        fail - the wrapper requests and responses are to be routed through when test evaluates to false on the request
        Returns:
        a conditional wrapper that routes requests and responses either through the pass or the fail wrapper according to the results of the test predicate
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null

      • preprocessor

        static Wrapper preprocessor(Function<Request,Request> mapper)
        Creates a request wrapper.
        Parameters:
        mapper - a request mapping function; must return a non-null value
        Returns:
        a wrapper that pre-process requests using mapper
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • preprocessor

        static <V> Wrapper preprocessor(Format<V> format,
                                BiFunction<Request,V,V> mapper)
        Creates a request body wrapper.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the body representation to be pre-processed
        Parameters:
        format - the format of the request body representation to be pre-processed
        mapper - the request body representation mapper; takes as argument a request and its body representation for format and must return a non-null updated value
        Returns:
        a wrapper that pre-process the format body representation of requests using mapper
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either format or mapper is null

      • postprocessor

        static Wrapper postprocessor(Function<Response,Response> mapper)
        Creates a response wrapper.
        Parameters:
        mapper - a response mapping function; must return a non-null value
        Returns:
        a wrapper that post-process responses using mapper
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • postprocessor

        static <V> Wrapper postprocessor(Format<V> format,
                                 BiFunction<Response,V,V> mapper)
        Creates a successful response body wrapper.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the body representation to be post-processed
        Parameters:
        format - the format of the response body representation to be post-processed
        mapper - the response body representation mapper; takes as argument a response and its body representation for format and must return a non-null updated value
        Returns:
        a conditional wrapper that post-process the format body representation of successful responses using mapper
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either format or mapper is null

      • success

        static Wrapper success(Function<Response,Response> mapper)
        Creates a successful response wrapper.
        Parameters:
        mapper - a successful response mapping function; must return a non-null value
        Returns:
        a conditional wrapper that post-process successful responses using mapper
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • error

        static Wrapper error(Function<Response,Response> mapper)
        Creates an error response wrapper.
        Parameters:
        mapper - an error response mapping function; must return a non-null value
        Returns:
        a conditional wrapper that post-process error responses using mapper
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • wrap

        default Wrapper wrap(Wrapper wrapper)
        Wraps a wrapper.
        Parameters:
        wrapper - the handler to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the combined wrapper generated by wrapping this wrapper around wrapper
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if wrapper is null

      • wrap

        Handler wrap(Handler handler)
        Wraps a handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the combined handler generated by wrapping this wrapper around handler
